DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to 1- detect and quantify HCV-PI resistant mutants with ultra-deep pyrosequencing (UDPS) technology, 2 - detect SNPs in P-glyocoprotein and CYP3A genes, in HCV mono-infected patients under/after Telaprevir treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Factors of the Treatment Failure in Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Infected Patients Treated With Telaprevir
DOC.criteria: HCV monoinfected subjects Age > 18 years HBV coinfection
